channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP GUI for Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP GUI for Windows

item.title: CVE-2021-21448|2024-08-03T18:16:22.425Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20gui%20for%20windows
item.description: SAP GUI for Windows, version - 7.60, allows an attacker to spoof logon credentials for Application Server ABAP backend systems in the client PCs memory. Under certain conditions the attacker can access information which would otherwise be restricted. The exploit can only be executed locally on the client PC and not via Network and the attacker needs at least user authorization of the Operating System user of the victim.

item.title: CVE-2022-41205|2024-08-03T12:35:49.518Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20gui%20for%20windows
item.description: SAP GUI allows an authenticated attacker to execute scripts in the local network. On successful exploitation, the attacker can gain access to registries which can cause a limited impact on confidentiality and high impact on availability of the application.

item.title: CVE-2021-27612|2024-08-03T21:26:10.276Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20gui%20for%20windows
item.description: In specific situations SAP GUI for Windows until and including 7.60 PL9, 7.70 PL0, forwards a user to specific malicious website which could contain malware or might lead to phishing attacks to steal credentials of the victim.
